text: José Ramón Beca Borrego (born 8 April 1953) is a Spanish-born equestrian, who has been competing for Uruguay since 2015. He competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics, the 1996 Summer Olympics and the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== == External links == * Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male equestrians Category:Uruguayan male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Spain Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:Equestrians at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Sportspeople from Seville
title: Ramón Beca
